# init(text:)

**Initializer**

Creates ruby text.

## Declaration

```swift
init(text: String)
```

## Parameters

- **text**: The ruby text.

## Creating Ruby text

- **init(text:position:alignment:)**: Creates ruby text with position and alignment.
